name: Ants Invasion: Protect Candies
description:
Stop the ants invasion from taking your candies. They continuously attack you non-stop just to steal your candies and invade your house for other foods later.

This will be the wonderful mild game for you to relax whenever you like. You will improve your concentration through playing this game as it is the most important factor that the game aims to.

You have to avoid killing our ally (wasp) or will game over.
Some ants are very crazily skilled. They can randomly turn into our ally, or even invisible to reach your house for candies and other foods.
Luckily, we already implemented a warning system when they reach the dangerous area, regardless of their appearance.

Let's relax now with Ants Invasion: Protect Candies from the ants.

Have fun and enjoy the game.
